about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
The story continues with Nikki at the office getting cornered by her asshole of a Boss, then seduced into a wild quickie while her husband is on the other side of a glass wall.
Will Adam figure out what’s happening behind the wall? Will he enjoy being made a cuckold again?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Nikki & Adam, and embark on their journey of spicing up their marital life in a brand new and wild cuckold Sex Story.

EPISODE 5
Another stressful project has finally ended, and Nikki is anxious to get her Boss’s signature on the draft. Even more, since her husband is on his way to pick her up for a dinner date at her favorite Italian Restaurant.

Only her asshole of a Boss has a different idea and doesn’t let her get away so easily. He corners Nikki in his locked office and convinces her to invite Adam up before seducing the slutty wife and fucking her right under her husband’s nose.

Will Adam figure out what’s happening behind the wall of glass?
Will he enjoy being made a cuckold again?

Follow their Sex Story and find out!

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex in still images among male/female characters.
